posts.post_content:
Looking to help my 13 year old neighbor boy get into collecting 206's.  Wouldn't mind starting him off with some Detroit Tigers.  Probably want to start off with SGC/PSA 2's so it doesn't eat up too much of his allowance money :)  --------- If anyone has any other nice condition 2's that aren't Tigers, feel free to offer them up.  I will probably just buy all I can and then distribute them to him as he earns them.

And hey Mike Cave ............ I'm back :)

Hey Steve welcome back! 

Mike Cave and I were talking about you the other day...
Very nice gesture and good luck
